Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Lockheed Martin's public documents detail formal commitments to fairness and bias mitigation in AI, including explicit principles and case studies. The company addresses data bias in AI/ML and demonstrates engagement through training and reporting.

Explainability.findings: Lockheed Martin demonstrates concrete investment and implementation of explainable AI, with partnerships and technology platforms focused on interpretability. The company publicly highlights explainability as a requirement for responsible AI and invests in companies specializing in this area.

summary.overallFindings: Lockheed Martin demonstrates comprehensive and public responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments. The company provides clear documentation, partnerships, and supplier requirements supporting ethical AI. There are no major gaps in publicly available evidence for any pillar.
